segments.text: I notice the little girl standing there, just waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this whole scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her brother is the one taking all the risks, and she’s just enjoying the show.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever been the one to climb up there before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s got her hand out, like she’s expecting him to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s smarter than her brother, letting him do the dangerous work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she looks while he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both get away with it before the woman notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s kind of cute how they’re working together to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
